org.smpp.pdu.tlv.TLVException

    org.smpp.pdu

    • Uses of TLVException in org.smpp.pdu

      Methods in org.smpp.pdu that throw TLVException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PDU PDU.createPDU(ByteBuffer buffer)
      This method gets the buffer and returns an instance of class corresponding to the type of the PDU which was in the buffer; the fields of the returned PDU are set to the data from the buffer.
      void PDU.setExtraOptional(short tag, ByteBuffer data)
      Creates new generic extra optional parameter with tag and data provided; uses TLVOctets for the parameter.
